# isDetached

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the window created by a popover’s detachment is automatically created.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isDetached: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/isDetached] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the detached window is automatically created. This property does not apply when detaching a popover results in a window returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopoverDelegate/detachableWindow(for:)].

## Managing a Popover’s Appearance

- **appearance**: The appearance of the popover.
- **effectiveAppearance**: The appearance that will be used when the popover is displayed onscreen.
- **animates**: Specifies if the popover is to be animated.
- **contentSize**: The content size of the popover.
- **isShown**: The display state of the popover.
